title: LinkedIn Orientation 2025
description: Hosted the LinkedIn Orientation 2025 at the School of Data Science & Business Intelligence, guiding first-year students on LinkedIn basics and how to leverage the platform for career growth as data science students.

title: SDBI 2025 Batch Orientation
description: I was invited as a guest speaker for the SDBI 2025 Batch Orientation, where I shared my journey and experiences with SDBI, providing insights and guidance to the new batch of students.

title: LinkedIn Orientation 2024
description: Led a LinkedIn Orientation at the School of Data Science & Business Intelligence for first-year bachelor’s and master’s students, focusing on LinkedIn basics, resume building, and ATS tips for career development.

title: LinkedIn Orientation 2023
description: Seminar for Bachelor's Freshers: Highlighting the Importance of LinkedIn and Effective Strategies for Leveraging It.

title: Tech Jam 2023
description: Led the hospitality team for TechJam, our college's annual tech event, with the responsibility of participant outreach. Successfully secured over 75 attendees for the event.

title: UTSAV FEST: 2020
description: Served as a key member of the public relations team for the fest at Shree L.R. Tiwari College, responsible for promoting the event at over 12 colleges across Mumbai.
